name: The St. Regis Istanbul
address: Mim Kemal Oke Cad No 35, Istanbul 34367
description: Capture possibilities at The St. Regis Istanbul, where timeless glamor and modern innovation meet. Nestled by the cosmopolitan Nişantaşı district, our 5 star hotel offers Istanbul's best address, surrounded by designer boutiques, luxury fashion brands, local eateries and European edifices of the Art Deco and Art Nouveau eras. Our luxury hotel provides a shining beacon of hospitality, featuring our signature St. Regis Butler Service to attend to your needs. Experience exquisite rooftop dinner at Wolfgang Puck's Spago or savor international cuisine on the verdant terrace of St. Regis Brasserie. Luxuriate with a bespoke treatment inside our Iridium Spa, before drifting off to sleep in our award-winning hotel suites, adorned with original artwork and discreet balconies overlooking tomorrow's adventures. Worried about leaving your furry friends behind? Bring them along! Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets with their own special accommodation rates.Marriott

name: Le Méridien Istanbul Etiler
address: Cengiz Topel Caddesi No: 39, Etiler, Istanbul 34337
description: Rising a stunning 34 stories above the city, this 5-star hotel in prestigious Etiler district enjoys a prime location from which to explore the prolific historic landmarks and many stylish restaurants, bars and boutiques Istanbul has to offer. Bask in unique panoramic views over the Bosphorus and Istanbul iconic bridges. Unlock Istanbul's best experiences from our luxury hotel while relaxing in a private cabana by the outdoor pool, indulging in a traditional Hamam or savoring classic Turkish dishes with a modern twist. A creative tribute to modernity and tradition, our 255 rooms and suites blend chic contemporary artwork and furnishings with classic Turkish motifs. Floor-to-ceiling windows frame stunning uninterrupted views of the city and the Bosphorus. Our hotel is pet friendly and welcomes trained pets for a fee. Host your next meeting or event at our conference hotel. We offer over 2500 sqm of event space, plenty of on-site parking and superb catering.Marriott

name: Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel
address: Rauf Orbay Caddesi Sahilyolu, No:10, Istanbul 34158
description: It is a treat to experience one of the world’s oldest cities, Istanbul standing astride two continents upon a strait, with Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel privilege. Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel is an unmatched option for guests looking to indulge in an unforgettable hotel experience in this exceptional city. Overlooking a splendid Marmara Sea view, Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel spans over an area of 40.000 square meters of lush nature offers a relaxing feeling to its guests coming for both business & leisure purposes. The hotel offers bright, spacious rooms, a large club lounge and a stunning pool area.The Sheraton Istanbul Ataköy Hotel is also within walking distance to a variety of shopping centers and the marina, with cafes and restaurants nearby.Marriott
